txt.en: 'Beware! The Dourhand line is strong, as strong as steel and just as sharp.'
'Dwalin son of Fundin is a just and good leader.'
'Thorin's Hall is a seat of great power, and its people will ever be as firm and sure as the mountain.'
'Some are troubled by the goblins in Rath Teraig, but goblins come and go as the season. We are the children of the mountain. We will endure.'
'Though the hour may be grim, neither rain nor tears fall in the halls of the dwarves.'
